channel.title: Mentios II [Back to Sunlight]
channel.description:
[B]Updatelogs (Note: I try to keep the game same)[/B] [CODE] [B]6.12.2013[/B] -Added 100% Lobby. -Gonna rip off full dragonfire shield which i made, from Enso II. -Converted Enso's combat system to Mentios. -Cleaned out some new bugs. -Fixed Grand exchange. (Won't be using upon launch.) -Implemented Quest System (from Enso, i wont use yet) [/CODE]
[B]Gameplay [/B] The reason was most likely that we had trial donatorship which means when you join to Mentios as a new player you received a 3 day -free- trial donator. This included huge xp boost and other utilities.
[B]Story[/B] Mentios was leaked by Xiles / Tyler, this made me to quit instantly and I had no motivation to program. I came up with Enso back to world of RSPS, even though im hosting Enso I will launch Mentios back. This is not just the regular Mentios it will include full dragonfire shield, ring of life and other cool features. Mentios is personally the first succesful server that I have made, Mentios has reached over 100 players. During Mentios 3 - Enso II I have learned very decent programming skills and I can make pretty much anything. This server is very nostalgic and could be a success again, why not?
[B]Media[/B] [img]http://puu.sh/5DLKF.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5DLJw.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5DLHz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2n021pl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/if4voj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/zxjy1y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2jgqhg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w6sfmc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/k2e5p4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25q7ubo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n82b1t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5dmc1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qdpwgp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2dace10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/syo9pd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/351wb47.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ynhv1h.jpg[/img]
[B]Official launch: 12.12.2013[/B]

item.title: Mentios II [Back to Sunlight]
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

You people don’t understand. You seriously think that you could change everything. You people don’t have control on the client. No one has refactored it. The server is just for content. Also, You people should use JavaScripting to reduce memory usage(I did this, was 400mb and became like 40mb). Really helped me a lot.

Read full topic
